module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *13.0.16* Support Alert info drop down *13.0.15* FREEPBX-10450 *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11033 *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10938 *13.0.12* FREEPBX-10918 *13.0.11* Dont double border *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10655 Invalid array argument *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10277 Fix musiconhold *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10294 Correctly set periodic-announce option when using Queue Callback *13.0.7* FREEPBX-9896 FREEPBX-10300 Array validation. Update tooltip for PJSIP *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9896 ultra strict not selectable in queue capacity options *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9843 Fix misspelling *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9603 add tab for agents, FREEPBX-9603 prevent failover dest being empty *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9511 Queue Breakout IVRs not selectable *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-9482 Display issue with Periodic Announcements in Queues *13.0.1alpha6* FREEPBX-9467 Update search hooks *13.0.1alpha5* FREEPBX-9434 Error page on queue edit / create *13.0.1alpha4* Add dynamic tab hooking to support BMO hooks and maintain backwards compatibility *13.0.1alpha3* Resolves FREEPBX-8610 and fixes the config aspect of FREEPBX-8216 that was overlooked. *13.0.1alpha2* Fix dialplan generation *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes
